snippet.title: Let's Play The Cinema Rosa (Puzzle/Exploration Game)
snippet.description:
Fund us on Kickstarter https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/1273762308/the-cinema-rosa-new-puzzle-game-by-atreyu-games#

Find out more about The Cinema Rosa: http://www.indiedb.com/games/projection

Facebook: www.facebook.com/AtreyuGames
Twitter: www.twitter.com/AtreyuGames
---
This is a run-through of the demo copy of The Cinema Rosa. If you'd like to play the demo, please join our discord channel: https://discord.gg/rqkYtZv

About the game:

The Cinema Rosa is an immersive PC and Mac exploration game, puzzle game and semi-horror game set in an abandoned cinema

The game explores themes of: loss, romance, nostalgia and regret, aiming to take the player on an emotional journey through the effects of a relationship. You take on the role of a protagonist exploring his past through various personal demons. As you explore, you encounter various notes, objects and puzzles that you can interact with, reconstructing the cinema to its former glory days.

The game is set for release in early 2019 on PC, Mac and Occulus, with a later planned release on Switch.

Follow us for more news about video games, PC gaming, Mac gaming and indie games. 

Please comment below with your thoughts on the game. Any feedback is useful!
